content.en: Deep Medical Learning: Pre-trained deep convolutional neural networks (CNNs) that are fine-tuned have been found to perform just as well, if not better, than CNNs trained from scratch in medical image analysis. Deep learning algorithms offer exciting possibilities for automating medical image analysis and improving visual diagnosis in medicine. Machine learning and deep learning techniques have been successfully applied to various aspects of medical image analysis, including classification, segmentation, and detection, and have the potential to revolutionize healthcare.
content.da: Dyb Medicinsk Læring: Forud-trænede dybe konvolutionelle neurale netværk (CNN'er), som er finjusterede, har vist sig at fungere lige så godt, hvis ikke bedre, end CNN'er trænet fra bunden i medicinsk billedanalyse. Dyb læring algoritmer tilbyder spændende muligheder for at automatisere medicinsk billedanalyse og forbedre visuel diagnose i medicinen. Maskinlæring og dyb læring teknikker er blevet anvendt med succes inden for forskellige aspekter af medicinsk billedanalyse, herunder klassifikation, segmentering og detektion, og har potentialet til at revolutionere sundhedsplejen.
